<h1 align="center">
  Constellations
</h1>


***"Constellations"*** is a Java application. This project was created as final project in Java programming classes.



***



###Technologies
1. Java

***
###Features


1. Adding and Removing stars from constellation
2. Displaying all stars
3. Displaying stars with different conditions: all stars in specific constellation, all stars with specified size, distance from Earth etc.
4. All changes were saved to ".obj" file 
    
  ***
